titleStmt.title: Catalogue of Tamil, Telugu, Kannada and Malayalam Manuscripts (BnF) by Vinson, Feer et al.

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: A cumulative (printed and handwritten) catalogue of the Tamil, Telugu, Kannada and Malayalam manuscripts in the BnF by Julien Vinson, Léon Feer et al.

The codex contains:
Catalogue (printed) by Julien Vinson for BnF Tamoul 1-204 = BnF Indien 1-204 (U1): second proof-readings of December 24, 1867 and January 6th, 1868 for Tamil 1-111, then first proof-readings of December 27, 1867 and January 8th, 1868 for Tamil 112-204; corrected in black ink by Vinson (?)
Catalogue (handwritten) by Julien Vinson for BnF Tamoul 205-496 = BnF Indien 205-496 (U2)
Catalogue (handwritten) by Léon Feer Vinson for BnF Tamoul 497-574 = BnF Indien 497-574 (U3)
Catalogue (handwritten) by Julien Vinson for BnF télingas, canaras, malayalas 1-60 (U4)
Letter by Vinson to Guérin, dated February 3rd, 1868 (U5)
Catalogue (handwritten) by Léon Feer for BnF télingas, canaras, malayalas 61-65 (U6)
Composite manuscript described as a multi-text manuscript for the sake of convenience.
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

msItem.title: Catalogue by Vinson (printed proofreadings) for BnF Tamoul 1-204 = BnF Indien 1-204
Catalogue by Vinson (handwritten notes) for BnF Tamoul 205-496 = BnF Indien 205-496
Catalogue by Feer (handwritten notes) for BnF Tamoul 497-574 = BnF Indien 497-574
Catalogue by Vinson (handwritten notes) for BnF télingas, canaras, malayalas 1-60
Letter by Vinson to Guérin, February 3rd, 1868
Catalogue by Feer (handwritten notes) for BnF télingas, canaras, malayalas 61-65

collation.desc: 8 folios = front guard leaves. No foliation.
49 folios = Catalogue by Vinson (printed proofreadings) for BnF Tamoul 1-204 = BnF Indien 1-204. Pagination 1-49. Arabic library foliation [1-49]. Versos blank.
64 folios = Catalogue by Vinson (handwritten notes) for BnF Tamoul 205-496 = BnF Indien 205-496. Arabic library foliation 50-113.
20 folios = Catalogue by Feer (handwritten notes) for BnF Tamoul 497-574 = BnF Indien 497-574. Arabic library foliation 114-125, 125A-125H.
11 folios = Catalogue by Vinson (handwritten notes) for BnF télingas, canaras, malayalas 1-60. Arabic library foliation 126-136.
1 folio = Letter by Vinson to Guérin, February 3rd, 1868. Arabic library foliation 137.
2 folios = Catalogue by Feer (handwritten notes) for BnF télingas, canaras, malayalas 61-65. Arabic library foliation 138-139. f139v blank.
4 folios = back guard leaves. Arabic library foliation 140-142, [143].

handNote.desc: Hand #2 (Feer). The descriptions of no. 572-573 (apparently by the hand of Rodet) are papers pasted on the page .

additions.desc: CATALOGUE DES MANUSCRITS TAMOUL ET TÉLINGA (front cover, recto).
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 577 (front cover, recto).
BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 577 (front cover, recto).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul 577 (f[1]r).
BnF shelfmark in black ink: N° 329. (f[3]r).
In black ink: Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. (f[3]r).
In black ink: Cet inventaire a été dressé en 1866 et 1867 par M. Julien Vinson, garde général des forêts. Li'mpression de ce travail a été arrêtée au n° 204. (f[3]r).

origin.origDate: The descriptions by Vinson were started in 1866 (see u1 f[3]r). Feer died in 1902.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 80, no. 577.
